body_html: We're upgraded to Bazel 0.4.2. So it should be safe to proceed I think. I'd recommend though that rules_webtesting adopt the multiple URLs feature that I added to Bazel recently. See our workspace.bzl for an example of how it's used.
body_text: We're upgraded to Bazel 0.4.2. So it should be safe to proceed I think. I'd recommend though that rules_webtesting adopt the multiple URLs feature that I added to Bazel recently. See our workspace.bzl for an example of how it's used.
body: We're upgraded to Bazel 0.4.2. So it should be safe to proceed I think. I'd recommend though that rules_webtesting adopt the multiple URLs feature that I added to Bazel recently. See our workspace.bzl for an example of how it's used.
